title: New client not working.
body:
I can log in to the new client, but if I click on the play, store, or settings button, it stops functioning. Most of the buttons and my friend list disappear, and I can't close it to restart it again.

[Screenshot](http://i.imgur.com/LbQ4R0O.png)

replies.body: This looks like a connection problem with pvp.net and the store, failing to download assets when loading content on the client.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune things up and restore those features.  Let me know if you have any questions!
